>>I'm wounds the MOST LOYAL fan of Saitou-sama. <<
 
With two websites devoted to Saitou alone (both of which are determined to make me bald by the end of the week with all the hair-pulling over format) and a fic site to SaitouxSano, I think you're going to have to share that title, wounds.  :-D  MOST LOYAL...
